title: Online Nursing Education Course: Strengthening Practical Competencies through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a hybrid learning environment combining interactive TV and online platforms, utilizing diverse interaction tools and real-time feedback systems; designed considering technology-based educational experiences of both students and instructors

learning_goals: Learners can explain core nursing theories (e.g., infection control, patient assessment) in online modules with over 80% accuracy
Learners evaluate teamwork and decision-making skills in simulated clinical scenarios through interactive TV sessions
Learners can analyze nursing ethics cases and propose alternatives based on collaborative learning experiences in online forums and group projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
